ENGLISH: By all that is sacred, the darkness beckons from our very doorstep.\! Army of Embor, rest will not come until we have cleansed this land in Donar's name.\! I give my life for Embor... Donar give us strength!
JAPANESE: 暗黒の影が我らの戸口に迫っている...\!エンボー軍よ、やつらを一掃し、この地の清浄を守り抜くまで安息は訪れぬぞ。\!命に代えても、故国の地を守り抜くのだ。ドナーよ、我に力を与えたまえ！

ENGLISH: No friend of the defenders of Dakur will be left behind!\! We shall lay down our lives to defend Duke Jaromir and the innocent people of Embor! Survive for just a little longer, Jaromir...
JAPANESE: ダクールは友を決して見捨てない！\!我らはジャロミール公爵とエンボーの民を守るため、命がけで戦う！だから、あと少し持ちこたえておくれ、ジャロミール...

ENGLISH: Praise to the heavens, our prayers answered... an army of the divine arrives.\! And may my faith be never shaken!
JAPANESE: おお...なんと！夢にも思わぬ援軍が来たぞ！\!ならば皆の者よ、心を一つに戦い抜こう！
